rootCause: The docs and nvme helper recipes in the justfile reintroduced spaced moustache placeholders (e.g. {{ sugarkube_cli }} and {{ start_here_args }}), so the guard tests could no longer detect that these targets shell through the unified CLI wrapper.
resolution: Normalized each affected recipe to call "{{sugarkube_cli}}" and forward its argument variables without internal whitespace so the tests recognise the CLI wrappers again.
